start.state: I am Rinkah, princess of the Flame Tribe. No matter the game, you won't beat me! Kagero and I have done this plenty of times.
It's brave to summon me when I'm all worked up. Are you ready to fight?

case.state: Don't be a goddamn coward ~name~! Show us something good!
No matter what you take off, you'll still probably be wearing more than Charlotte.
Give us a good show ~name~!
Whatever you take off, I'm sure my friend Oboro could just replace it.
Come on, let's make this battle interesting!
Looking at you more closely, you've got a pretty good body ~name~. Maybe we could get a little more... physical some time?
Looking at you more closely, you've got a pretty good body ~name~. Maybe we could get a little more... physical some time?
Blue hair? You wouldn't happen to be royalty would you?
Hm... I get a weird vibe from you... But I'm sure Rhajat would be happy to learn more about you.
You like to dance from what I've heard. I should introduce you to Azura.
You seem to be quite fashionable... I bet Oboro and you would make fast friends.
So you're a mercenary ~name~? Ever thought of reclassing into something better?
So you're a ninja ~name~? We've got plenty of them back in Hoshido.
The way you sing, it reminds me of a princess I know.
I'd stay back princess, plants don't last very long against fire.
I'm a bit disapointed you didn't bring your hammer. I would have loved to have given it a swing.
Chasing after men is certainly one way to stay in shape, but it's not for me.
There's something about you Ayano that just seems... Off...
You might be a vampire hunter Buffy, but I don't think you've dealt with anything as blood sucking as Jacob!
I've heard you're quite good at games, but can you handle me?
Now you seem like a princess that knows how to live. I'm very curious about this "motorcycle" I've been told you ride.
Careful while playing with fire, miss "Ice Witch".
Don't make this awkward Corrin...
I'm surprised you'd play this sort of game Corrin. Charlotte or Orochi maybe, but not you...
You're certainly different from the pegasus riders I know Florina. Not that that's a bad thing.
Well this is certainly an interesting development.
Yeah, uh, you're not the Sakura I thought you'd be...
It's strange Futaba... I get the feeling that you'd fit right in with the Wind Tribe... But I don't know why... You certainly aren't dressed for the desert...
Everything about your world is so different to ours... The technology I've heard you have seems almost like our world's magic.
So you're Korra? I've heard that you could do interesting things with fire. Care to show me once this is over?
Well, well, well. Seems you're in good shape.
I've heard that you do quite a bit of exploring. You must be in great shape.
Oh, you're Lilith? I was expecting someone else.
Even though you seem to be in good shape, was it really a good idea to come to this place wearing so little?
Careful missy. Fire melts icecream.
I gotta say, you're leagues more pleasant than the other gods I know.
It's always interesting to see just how different princesses can be depending on the kingdom.
It's rather interesting to see just how different the magic you use is from the magic that we have in my world. I'm sure Orochi would love to spend some time with you.
I must say, the weapons from your world fascinate me. Could you perhaps let me borrow your scythe when this game is over?
Try not to lose your way Ryuko.
You're Samus? I've heard that you have also had some trouble because of dragons. That makes two of us.
Your power suit has caught my intrigue, I've heard that it can go up against dragons. I wish we had that when we were fighting Anankos.
That's some rather interesting armor Sei... Care for a spar after this is over?
I wonder who has better moves... You, or Azura?
I've heard quite a bit about your world Sonya. Endless fighting, multiverses, war, strange creatures, strange outfits, ninjas... I almost thought it was my own for a bit.
I've heard quite a bit about your world Sonya. Endless fighting, multiverses, war, strange creatures, strange outfits, ninjas... I almost thought it was my own for a bit.
A ghost? This isn't Rhajat's doing is it?
I've seen quite a few strange pieces of headwear in my day, but that hat is certainly up there.
So you're Tifa? I've heard you're quite good at melee combat. Would you care to go a round after this is over?
So you're Videl? I hear you're a good fighter. Wanna go a round or two after this?
How bout that, it seems that you haven't been slacking on training your body.
What- What is this? I've faced Armies... Dragons... Zombies... but none of them have the same dangerous aura that you have...
Off it comes! Hurry!
Let's see those muscles ~name~!
Take us to the gunshow ~name~!
I really don't know if I should be staring at Corrin...
Now the battle can get going.
I'm curious as to what you have left to take off Chica...
That armor always looked a bit tedious to put on Corrin. Sorry that you're gonna have to do it again once this game is over.
Dear god. As Princess of the Flame Tribe, I understand how dangerous fire can be. I'm sorry to hear this.
So you're Shantae huh? I wonder what's in better shape, my abs, or your hips?
So you're Shantae huh? I wonder what's in better shape, my abs, or your hips?
So you're Sharla huh? I must say some of the things I've seen from your world are very interesting. I'm very intrigued by the things you call "gems".
Show me how hot you burn, Yang!
Not bad, I wouldn't mind sharing the hotsprings with you when this is over.
I may be a princess, but that doesn't mean I wouldn't show you a wild time ~name~.
Now it's ~name~ time!
Winning has never felt so sweet.
That's quite a bit to take off all at once isn't it? You must be confident.
Quite the costly mistake you've made Ann.
Gods! Even Anankos would find that huge!
I see plenty of them at the hotsprings, but that doesn't make this any less exciting.
Yeah! Let's see some action!
Now we're getting started.
The real battle has just begun!
That's more like it!
The battle has only just begun I suppose.
Now we can get started for real.
Already? And I haven't even taken anything off yet!
Enjoying yourself ~name~? Maybe you'd like some help later?
Skip the fluff. You can see my abs, it's only fair you show us some skin, ~player~.
Come on ~player~, what's your reclassed outfit gonna look like?
Oh yeah. That's the good shit.
Hey look at that! We match!
So wild and free! That's the way a warrior does it!
Corrin, maybe I should educate you a bit on some Flame Tribe customs...
Goodness princess, given the size of the army you manage, when do you even find time to shave?
Well. I'm gonna remember this for as loooong as I can.
Now this is getting good.
Well I was gonna start with my gloves, so it would be hypocritical of me to get mad at you.
Smart move. I was gonna do the same.
Animal ears? Just like Kaden's!
So that's the legendary Mani Katti? Interesting.
Not bad. Not bad at all.
Looking pretty good ~name~. What kind of training do you do?
*Wolf Whistle*
You lost so quickly... Was it on purpose?
Nice! Very, very nice! You gotta tell me your workout method!
That's the stuff! We should work out together sometime.
Gods... They're as big as Camilla's!
Gods... Even Charlotte would blush.
Well well well... Show us a good time ~name~.
Let's see if you can stack up to the men of the Flame Tribe ~name~.
Looking at you more closely, you've got a pretty solid body ~name~. Could I touch your muscles? I'd let you touch mine.
Looking at you more closely, you've got a pretty solid body ~name~. Could I touch your muscles? I'd let you touch mine.
So you're a mercenary ~name~? Ever thought of reclassing into something better?
So you're a ninja ~name~? We've got plenty of them back in Hoshido.
Time for you to show us your moves right?
Well, I didn't think I'd hear Nintendo's golden example of a silent protagonist speak. Must be my lucky day.
Don't make this awkward Corrin...
When I heard Xander was playing, I was excited at the idea that I could challenge the crown prince of Nohr, so forgive me for being a bit disappointed.
Feh. You lost before I even got naked. You're gonna miss out on something good.
Come on ~player~, what's it gonna be?
Come on ~player~, what's your reclassed outfit gonna look like?
Well, show us what kind of man you are ~name~.
Oh. I expected more from you.
Is that all?
I suppose we all start small.
Accessories are not but a battlefield distraction...
So this is the legendary Ryu? I'd love a sparring match after this is over.
So this is the legendary Ryu? I'd love a sparring match after this is over.
SHIT! It got all over my clothes! You owe me for that ~name~!
Aww... They're so cute... FORGET I SAID THAT.
I like what I'm seeing. And I'm glad that for once Soleil and Laslow aren't here to ruin the view.
What an... interesting place to have piercings...
It's uh... nothing I haven't already seen in the hotsprings... Right Corrin?
Well, it's gone now.
Accessories are not but a battlefield distraction...
I'll beat anyone in battle, with or without an accessory!
Most of the people I know are covered head to toe in accessories, and often, little else.
Makes sense. I intend to start with something small also.
So you're Lyn, princess of the Sacae plains? I suppose we're alot alike then. I'd love to share stories with you sometime.
Perhaps you would be down for a spar sometime Lady Lyndis?
So you're Shantae huh? I wonder what's in better shape, my abs, or your hips?
So you're Shantae huh? I wonder what's in better shape, my abs, or your hips?
So you're Sharla huh? I must say some of the things I've seen from your world are very interesting. I'm very intrigued by the things you call "gems".
Show me how hot you burn, Yang!
Flawless victory. Rinktality!
Not a scratch on me!
Don't mind me, just enjoying the view.
I like what I'm seeing. I like it a lot.
Well, it's better than nothing.
Ha! I can see you're getting tense!
So this is the legendary Ryu? I'd love a sparring match after this is over.
So this is the legendary Ryu? I'd love a sparring match after this is over.
Seemed fun... I know what I'm doing later tonight.
This is what makes all the fighting worth it.
Finally, the reason we all play this game.
Come on, show us what you've got Corrin!
I haven't even taken anything off, and you're already masturbating? I must be great at this game.
Reminds me of when Kagero and I used to play.
Finally. Things are starting to get interesting.
I, Rinkah, shall claim victory in this game!
This is too easy for the daughter of the leader of the Flame Tribe.
Finally some progress!
What... THE FUCK!?
It feels a bit early for this... but I'm not gonna complain.
Come on, you could've lasted just a bit longer.
Goodness...Corrin, I...
I'm on fire!.
Don't get to close! You'll get singed!
Get ready to get burned!
Just what I needed.
I can feel it... The power inside me grows!
I can't lose! My body feels like it's on fire!
...This isn't half bad.
Feh, nothing I can't handle.
This could've gone better, but I suppose it could've gone worse.
Alright, whatever.
I've gotten out of worse situations than this.
Being in the arena makes me tremble with excitement. Let the battle begin!
Hey dealer, gimme ~cards~ cards.
Just pass me ~cards~.
~cards~ for me. Thanks.
This won't do. I need ~cards~ new cards!
Dammit! I wish I could burn these cards up!
What did I do to deserve this?
This is for me...? Hmm... Can't say I really want it...
The hell's with these cards?
I miss my ~clothing~ already...
Well, I guess it was my turn eventually.
I'm sure you've all been waiting for this.
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.
I'm not afraid of a challenge! Come at me!
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.
Just my gloves. If you want to see the goods, you better fight with all you've got.
Things are going good Corrin, how are things with you?
I guess this is fair. Don't want this battle to be too easy.
I guess I shouldn't have been taking it so easy on you guys.
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.
Is that so? I'd love to meet her Chiaki.

Come on now ~name~, I need to see if your body is anywhere as good as mine.
Show us some muscle ~name~!
Reclass into something good, okay?
Looking at you more closely, you've got a pretty good body ~name~. Maybe we could get a little more... physical some time?

I've still got so much left to take off. Glad you're the one taking damage instead of me.
Try not to feel too defeated, when your facing off against me, this is bound to happen.
Oh. I expected more from you.
Is that all?
Think that accessories are gonna save you from the storm that is me? Think again!
Whatever, you'll run out of HP soon enough.
